title: Exercitatio Sacra De Christo Theanthropo, Eiusque Adventu In Carnem. Quam Sub Praesidio Viri admodum Reverendi, Clarißimi atq[ue] Excellentißimi Dn. Johannis Scharfii, SS. Theolog. Doctoris & Professoris Publici celeberrimi, nec non Alumnorum Electoralium Ephori, &c. Dn. Praeceptoris, Patroni, ac Promotoris sui omni honoris cultu prosequendi atq[ue] devenerandi, Publico examini subiicit Johannes Schmidt/ Brandenburgo-Marchicus, Autor & Respondens. In Auditorio Maiori, ad diem VI. Decemb. horis matutinis
creator: Scharf, Johann  Schmidt, Johannes  Saur, Wilhelmus  Deutschman, Johannes  Gebhardi, Martinus  Hasse, Christophorus  Susemihlius, Joachimus
subject: Historische Drucke
source: Scharf, Johann  Schmidt, Johannes  Saur, Wilhelmus  Deutschman, Johannes  Gebhardi, Martinus  Hasse, Christophorus  Susemihlius, Joachimus: Exercitatio Sacra De Christo Theanthropo, Eiusque Adventu In Carnem. Quam Sub Praesidio Viri admodum Reverendi, Clarißimi atq[ue] Excellentißimi Dn. Johannis Scharfii, SS. Theolog. Doctoris & Professoris Publici celeberrimi, nec non Alumnorum Electoralium Ephori, &c. Dn. Praeceptoris, Patroni, ac Promotoris sui omni honoris cultu prosequendi atq[ue] devenerandi, Publico examini subiicit Johannes Schmidt/ Brandenburgo-Marchicus, Autor & Respondens.
